title: Task 1.4: Extend StatisticalController to All Controllers
description: Make SteppingController and RealTimeController implement StatisticalController. Add spectrum tracking (optional, disabled by default for performance). Use ConcurrentHashMap for thread safety. Tests: interface implementation, getSpectrum() validity, performance impact. Modifies: SteppingController.java, RealTimeController.java
close_reason: SteppingController and RealTimeController now implement StatisticalController. Added spectrum tracking (disabled by default) with ConcurrentHashMap for thread safety. 6 new tests.

title: Task 1.1: Simulation Builder Class
description: Design and implement fluent Simulation.Builder with: withSeed(long), withMaxTime(long), withStatistics(boolean), withName(String), build(). Must maintain backward compatibility. Tests: builder defaults, fluent chaining, build() validity, seed effects. File: framework/src/main/java/com/hellblazer/primeMover/Simulation.java
close_reason: Implemented Simulation.Builder with fluent API (withSeed, withMaxTime, withStatistics, withName, build). 11 tests passing. Backward compatible - existing SimulationController usage unaffected.

Task 1.2: Simulation.run() Convenience Methods
description: Implement static Simulation.run(Runnable) and Simulation.run(Runnable, long maxTime). Auto-setup controller, execute runnable, return SimulationResult. Support try-with-resources. Tests: execution, auto-cleanup, maxTime stops, returns statistics. Uses Simulation.Builder from 1.1.
close_reason: Implemented Simulation.run(Runnable) and run(Runnable, maxTime) with SimulationResult record. Builder.run() for fluent API. 9 new tests (20 total). Auto-cleanup via try-with-resources.

title: Task 2.4: Failure Seed Reporting
description: TestWatcher.testFailed() logs seed used, generates copy-paste reproduction command. Format: 'To reproduce: @Seed(123456789L)'. Tests: seed in failure output, reproduction works. Modifies: SimulationExtension.java

title: Implement ModuleLevelBuilder that loads ClassFile API
Prime Mover Simulation Controller Redesign
description: Comprehensive redesign of simulation controllers to improve developer experience, reduce boilerplate, and enable seamless JUnit 5 integration. Addresses: (1) Setup boilerplate - 5+ lines repeated in every test/demo, (2) Time API confusion, (3) Statistics fragmentation, (4) Missing StatisticalController on SteppingController/RealTimeController. Four phases: Core API, JUnit 5 Integration, Verification API, IDE/Debugging. ChromaDB refs: design::primemover::simulation-controller-redesign-2026-01, analysis::codebase::primemover-controller-architecture-2026-01-02
